body.raw:
# Milk tea recipe
- boil milk on low heat for ~20mins
- when it comes to a boil, add 2 teaspoons of black tea leaves (or 2 tea bags)
- add ginger, cardamon, ect.
- stir, and remove when the color is appropriate
